value: Hi, I'm Sean Morgan and I teach the American accent.
Now, you might think it's kind of weird
that someone teaches an accent.
But actually, you know pronunciation is one of the most important parts of learning a language
But unfortunately language schools and programs all over the world
don't even teach it, they focus on grammar and some things that aren't as essential for communication
for things like travel
So, there are lots of people
that definitely need help with people understanding them
whether it's in the business world
where English is the most important language in the world
or academics, where once again English is primary.
or travel where it's that common language that people use everywhere
to communicate
So, if you're getting those confused faces
and people are asking you to repeat yourself
you probably need training in pronunciation.
and that's where I come in
So, we're going to go through all the sounds in the English language.
starting with the ten or so most important vowel sounds
that usually make up the bulk of an accent.
and I can help you so that you can reduce your accent significantly
within just a few short hours
so that people can understand you
with more clarity
now you might think that's kind of an unrealistic goal
however sometimes the things that click in your brain
can happen immediately
but sometimes it takes a little time and a little practice because this is a physical practice
you know we are training the micro-muscles in our mouth
our tongue and our throat
and we're also training sounds that we may not have in our native language
so it might take a little bit of time
but your can significantly reduce your accent
in an amount of months, it doesn't have to take years
So, lets get started.
